oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Parrott shell fragment from Woodbury, TN engagement
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dug near Woodbury, probably from an 1863 skirmish involving Kentucky cavalry units with Confederate Gen. John Hunt Morgan and Union artillery. The Federal Parrott pieces, according to the Official Records, were trying to dislodge Morgan's dismounted men behind a double stone wall along the Woodbury to Nashville Pike.
